    1: def __getattr__(attr_name):
    2:     import warnings
    3: 
    4:     from numpy.linalg import _linalg
    5:     ret = getattr(_linalg, attr_name, None)
    6:     if ret is None:
    7:         raise AttributeError(
    8:             f"module 'numpy.linalg.linalg' has no attribute {attr_name}")
    9:     warnings.warn(
   10:         "The numpy.linalg.linalg has been made private and renamed to "
   11:         "numpy.linalg._linalg. All public functions exported by it are "
   12:         f"available from numpy.linalg. Please use numpy.linalg.{attr_name} "
   13:         "instead.",
   14:         DeprecationWarning,
   15:         stacklevel=3
   16:     )
   17:     return ret
